name: Queen of Witches
description: The Queen of Witches is a massive, imposing figure known for her powerful spellcasting and her ability to control the battlefield. She wields the Moonsilver Ring, adorned with radiant power, enhancing her already formidable melee attacks.
memorable: Her ability to absorb spells and regain health, as well as her devastating Spray of Moonlight, make her a terrifying opponent.
goals: To maintain control over her domain and manipulate those around her.
relations: May serve as a leader to lesser fey creatures or witches, and could be related to other magical beings.
environment: Often found in enchanted forests or areas where magic is strong, likely during the night when moonlight is abundant.
strengths: High Armor Class, significant hit points, and resistance to several damage types. Her ability to absorb spells and regenerate health provides unmatched resilience.
weaknesses: Primarily vulnerable to cold iron weapons, which bypass her damage resistance.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of melee attacks with her Moonsilver Ring and ranged attacks with Mystical Blast, dealing slashing and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Her Spray of Moonlight can deal massive radiant damage and has the potential to blind enemies, while her absorb spell ability allows her to regain health.
equipment: Moonsilver Ring, enhances her melee damage and provides radiant attacks.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing her to see through illusions and magical darkness, as well as a high passive perception of 20.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, Deception, History, Insight, and Perception, making her adept in both combat and social situations.
additional_information: Immunity to being blinded, charmed, or frightened.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells.
Legendary Resistance allows her to succeed on failed saving throws three times a day.
Token of Favor ability grants allies magic resistance at her discretion.
Has access to powerful spells like power word kill and true polymorph.
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will, including faerie fire and silent image; can cast higher-level spells like power word kill and true polymorph.
test_queries: powerful fey spellcaster with radiant abilities
large witch that manipulates the battlefield
magical queen with devastating moonlight attacks
spellcaster immune to charms and fear
